title: OT23: La gira
overview: The documentary, produced by Gestmusic (Banijay Iberia), will consist of two episodes. The first, 60 minutes long, will explore the changes in the contestants' lives after their time at the Operaci√≥n Triunfo Academy and follow the rehearsals for this summer's music tour. It will give viewers a unique insight into the emotions behind the scenes during the concerts and the celebrations at each successful tour stop, which has already sold over 150,000 tickets. The second episode will be a special film of the concert, filmed at the WiZink Centre, allowing viewers at home to enjoy the unforgettable experience of this tour.
